title: unexcepted error with the login seesion
body: i can login yesterday but i cant login just now. and it said ' there was an unexcepted error with the login seesion. please try again. i tried 5 times and reinstalled the game. but still cant login.

replies.body:
From the link hyperion posted (https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/XbalfWLe-the-region-selector-will-be-removed-from-the-login-screen-starting-next-week), could it be this?

> If you haven’t yet updated to a Riot Account, you’ll get an error message when you try to sign in and will not be able to get past the login screen. At this point you’ll need to head over to the account update website before you can play. https://update-account.riotgames.com/

Weren't those forced to update the account supposed to recieve an e-mail?

EDIT: Also oddly, I tried launching the client second time and it disappeared for me. But not for OP. Odd. I'll see tomorrow whether it'll reappear.

EDIT2: So I tried the page and it claims no change to my username is required, so that's why I didn't recieve the email. Looks like my issue of one-time error was related to something else.

Delete LeagueClientSettings.yaml and solved.
If not just press the X at the corner then error appear,  then click logout. this willl end the auto login

Can you have a look at these posts and let us know:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/WIVEREqw-cannot-log-in-lol-using-wifi-but-ethernet-is-ok
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/ask-the-community/VcrvzuW9-login-not-working
https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/XbalfWLe-the-region-selector-will-be-removed-from-the-login-screen-starting-next-week
